Html:
Hi,

I have a big problem :). When i want create an update for example Adobe Flash player, at the publishing step, i have this error : Cannot access a closed stream.


My server works on windows 2008 R2 with WSUS-3.2.7600.226. We don't use SSL on server.

Can you help me ?

Thanks in advance.

It's ok after installation of these 3 updates : KB2530678 KB2530709 and KB2720211.

Thank you very much for you help.
